DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine investigational drug safe efficacious poorly control type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Oral Antidiabetic Agent Treatment Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes least 3 month . Diabetes manage diet exercise alone either metformin sulfonylurea alone adjunct diet exercise . Diabetes therapy must unchanged least 3 month prior screen . Females must nonchildbearing potential ( surgically sterilize least 1 year postmenopausal , define cessation menses ) . Female patient surgically sterilize less equal 45 year postmenopausal status confirm FSH great 30ng/mL screening . Current use insulin antidiabetic agent sulfonylurea agent metformin . Current use metformin sulfonylurea agent combination . History liver disease . History unstable angina ( define Braunwald system ) , myocardial infarction , coronary revascularization procedure within past 6 month . Currently suspect carcinoma history carcinoma last 5 year , exception excise superficial lesion basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma skin .
